title: A Busy Day of Shopping
description: Sophie talks about a busy shopping day and what she learned from it.
speaker: Sophie
text: Last Saturday, I had a very busy day of shopping in the city.
I needed to buy clothes, food, and a gift for my friendâ€™s birthday.
In the morning, I visited several stores and compared prices carefully.
After that, I went to the supermarket and bought everything on my list.
In the afternoon, I felt tired because the shops were crowded and noisy.
At one store, I waited a long time to pay, which made me a little impatient.
When I finally returned home, I felt relieved and satisfied.
Next time, I am going to shop earlier in the day to avoid crowds.
